This is a copy of code written and made available by Professor Peter Corke (https://petercorke.com).

Robotics Toolbox for MATLAB webpage, including documentation and links to community support:  
https://petercorke.com/wordpress/toolboxes/robotics-toolbox

Robotics Toolbox for MATLAB code:
https://github.com/petercorke/robotics-toolbox-matlab

If you like the Toolbox and want to cite it please reference it as:
P.I. Corke, “Robotics, Vision & Control”, Springer 2017, ISBN 978-3-319-54413-7.  [bibtex]
